title: A Contrastive Learning Approach for Unsupervised Anomaly Detection on Contrast-Enhanced Brain MRI Images
details: S Pasumarthi, S Kumar, R Chamberlain
abstract: Approach: Using deep learning (DL), we synthesized healthy T1CE images from non- contrast images available in public datasets. We also synthesized healthy- anomalous paired images and forced the DL network to learn the healthy …
